item.title: Paper on Query Plan Representation accepted at PVLDB 2026
item.description: TATA: An Efficient Framework for Task Transfer in Query Plan Representation. Yue Zhao, Songsong Mo, Gao Cong.

item.title: Paper on Learned Index for Trajectory Data accepted at SIGMOD 2025
item.description: BT-Tree: A Reinforcement Learning Based Index for Big Trajectory Data. Tu Gu, Kaiyu Feng, Jingyi Yang, Gao Cong, Long Cheng, Rui Zhang.

item.title: Paper on LLM-enhanced Query Rewrite accepted at PVLDB 2025
item.description: LLM-R2: A Large Language Model Enhanced Rule-based Rewrite System for Boosting Query Efficiency. Zhaodonghui Li, Haitao Yuan, Huiming Wang, Gao Cong, Lidong Bing.

item.title: Paper on Parametric Query Optimization accepted at PVLDB 2025
item.description: RankPQO: Learning-to-Rank for Parametric Query Optimization. Songsong Mo, Yue Zhao, Zhifeng Bao, Quanqing Xu, Chuanhui Yang, Gao Cong.
